content.body: Are all the tc39 delegates in the tc39 GitHub org?
In other words: if someone on GitHub claims to be in tc39 but they are not in the org, can I assume that they are trolling?
* In other words: if someone on GitHub claims to be in tc39 but they are not in the org, can I assume that they are trolling?

m.new_content.body: In other words: if someone on GitHub claims to be in tc39 but they are not in the org, can I assume that they are trolling?

content.body: I believe that is the goal but I would not be surprised to learn we've missed some people
